comment: Lemma for ~ aev and ~ axc16g . Change free and bound variables. Instance of ~ aev . (Contributed by NM, 22-Jul-2015.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 17-Feb-2018.) Remove dependency on ~ ax-13 , along an idea of BJ. (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 30-Nov-2019.) (Revised by BJ, 29-Mar-2021.)
